title: Seekers Alliance - 📜│bounty-board
html:
Greetings, @Seeker! :MeowParty: 

Whether you're new here or returning after some time away, this Bounty Board will always show the current community events that you can participate in. Join us to collect some bounties! 🎯

title: Seekers Alliance - 📜│bounty-board
html: Pinned a message.

title: Seekers Alliance - 📜│bounty-board
html:
⭐ 🏮 **LUNAR NEW YEAR BINGO** 🏮 ⭐

The Lunar New Year is the most important holiday of the year for many cultures. It is a time for families and celebrations. This year, LNY falls on 2/10, and we will be entering the 🐉 **Year of the Dragon** 🐉.

Whether or not you normally celebrate Lunar New Year, Seekers Alliance invites you to a fun LNY Bingo challenge! 

**The fastest Faction to complete 8️⃣ (a lucky number in the Chinese culture because it sounds similar to “fa”, or “fortune”) lines — vertically, horizontally, or diagonally — wins the game.**

The winning Faction will be able to try out their luck in a raffle for 🧧 **8 Seekers Alliance NFT Card Packs**! 🧧 (Packs to be airdropped prior to game launch.)

Teamwork is paramount! 🤜 🤛 **Each category requires 9️⃣ photo entries to complete. **📸  

Each DiscordID can only upload one photo in each category. Your photo must be square-shaped 🌄 and **must include a hand-written note 📝 with “Seekers Alliance” and your Discord ID** (unless it’s “screenshot only”). 

**Upload your photo to your Faction channel and indicate the category it belongs to. **Our mods will then verify and upload to Google Sheets, where you can keep an eye on each Faction’s progress. 👀 👀 👀 

*If you’re not in a Faction (tsk, tsk!), normally you wouldn’t be able to participate. However, in the spirit of the 🧨 Lunar New Year 🧨, you will be able to join a faction if you first complete** 3 BINGO lines **by yourself. (Mods will manually verify and add you to your Faction of choice, where you can reuse your entries.)*

title: Seekers Alliance - 📜│bounty-board
html:
Here's the master BINGO grid: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1eBHgsR0PuVnM2GIjmP9-YWSoHtOBAJQBtVk9z555iPE

The Faction scores will be at the top. 

See the SAMPLE tab on how to play.

(Everyone has viewing permissions but only mods have edit permissions to help fill out the grid.)

title: Seekers Alliance - 📜│bounty-board
html:
Just a reminder @Seekers that the Lunar New Year Bingo is on-going! 

House Galahad is taking the lead by far... @Van der Leck has yet to show up! 🤣 🤣 🤣 

Remember the prize will be 8 NFT card packs to be raffled off in the winning Faction... that's a pretty high chance of getting a pack if your Faction wins!

It literally takes 5 minutes to take & upload a picture. I'm doing at least one a day! 😇

title: Seekers Alliance - 📜│bounty-board
html:
@Galahad and @Mahdia sheets are quickly filling up! 

Looks like Galahad is still in the lead though!

@Van der Leck is a bit sad with only one entry from @QadyrGUN... but still time to catch up!!!


Some notes:

1️⃣ All entries should have been uploaded to the sheets as of now. If you don't see yours, please let @Elite Seekers know. 

2️⃣ Please make sure your entries are SQUARE for better uploading/viewing experience. 

3️⃣ Don't forget to include the category of your submission! 🙂

Good luck & Happy Lunar New Year! 🧧

@Galahad 37 vs. @Mahdia 36 vs. @Van der Leck 3

🧧 8 NFT packs to be raffled out to the winning Faction, what are you waiting for?

The race is SO CLOSE between Galahad & Mahdia... who's going to get the card packs???

title: Seekers Alliance - 📜│bounty-board
html:
Hi @Seekers!

Sorry it's been a few days since our last update. We've been working hard on  game development & recently another hackathon to get our name out there! Not to mention one of our Founders, Fenix, will be attending ETH Denver next week. 🔥 🔥 🔥 

That said, TOMORROW will mark **2 WEEKS** since the Lunar New Year BINGO event had gone live. 

**Our current progress is: **
@Galahad: 49
@Mahdia: 60
@Van der Leck: 12


Let's do a ✅ VOTE ✅ :

⭕ : We keep the BINGO event open for another 2 weeks to see if any Faction will get the max # of rewards. (8 NFT card packs plus secret bonuses along the way.)

❌ : We close the BINGO event after 2 weeks (in about 12 hours), and the winning Faction will get half the original rewards. (Meaning instead of 8 NFT card packs, only 4 will be raffled off within the winning Faction.)

Take your pick! 🤔

title: Seekers Alliance - 📜│bounty-board
html: Oh, also, if your submission is NOT on the BINGO sheets, please reach out to an @Elite Seeker. 🙏  Everything should be accounted for.

title: Seekers Alliance - 📜│bounty-board
html:
@Seekers, one more thing... 😏 

By popular demand, we're going to make it easier for the people who are not yet in a Faction to join a Faction...  ❤️ ❤️ ❤️ 

Previously, you had to complete 3️⃣ lines on the BINGO sheet to join a Faction of your choice. Now, you only have to complete 1️⃣ ! 

This way, our newer joiners can find a home & we can solve the BINGO faster to receive the rewards! 🔥 🔥 🔥 

:6876pepegasrun: :6876pepegasrun: :6876pepegasrun:  **Don't have a Faction yet? Come quick!!!**

Seekers Alliance - 📜│bounty-board
html:
@Seeker 

# Get Off Your Butt & Work Off :pepenarutorun: the Feasts!  

 ⭐🏮 *The Lunar New Year festival has come to an end.* Take a moment to** check your tummy** :pepefatpepe: have you indulged in too many Lunar New Year snacks 😋 ?** Do you feel the need to get back on track and work off those extra calories? **:ElmoBURNrise: 

Join us in our March** fitness challenge!** From **now until the end of March**.
**We challenge you to work out at least 30 minutes every day. The Faction with the highest number of “active calories” burned will emerge as the winner.**

** Winning faction members who participate in the event will get to 🎟️  raffle off 10 card packs.**
*(Active event participants will receive the “Burner” role and be able to participate in the raffle!) *

## Each photo needs to have a hand-written note with your Discord ID.
Ensure that your records include the following information:
> 1. Workout Date  📅  Start From now until the end of March 
> 2. Calories Burned :fire: 
> 3. Workout type, distance, length of time :pepenarutorun:  🏊🏻‍♂️  🚲 

**For Newcomer Who don't have Faction Role
Submit pic in #deleted-channel  ⁠or #deleted-channel and get Burner Role, ** in order to see ⁠#🃏│choose-your-faction

**For Who have Faction Role Submit pic in your Faction Thread Channel **

**To participate, simply take a photo 🖼️  of your daily workout metrics.** You can run,** walk, bike, swim, or do anything else in between, as long as you can show a digital record of your workout.** :swing: 

Let’s motivate each other to get moving, fellow Seekers! It’s time to break a sweat and finally get started on that New Year resolution! :catfive:

title: Seekers Alliance - 📜│bounty-board
html:
Q: Can I still participate if I don't have a smart watch? 

A: YES! Most smart phones come pre-loaded with "Health" apps that will record your daily Calories burned! 

For iPhones, find the "Active Energy" card, selet the day of the week, and it will show you how many Calories you burned. (See screenshots.)

1: Find "Active Energy". If you can't find it, go to "Edit" and add "Active Energy" to Favorites.

2. Click on "Active Energy". Select "W" for Week (because then it will show the date). 

3. Hover over the day you want and see total Calories burned.

title: Seekers Alliance - 📜│bounty-board
html:
# **:bangbang: Exciting news, @Seeker s :bangbang: **
Get ready for an upcoming Discord event that is bound to be a blast! :boom: It will be interactive, exciting, and totally awesome!:sparkles:  But before you dive into the action, there's a crucial decision to make: **which Faction will you join?**:face_with_monocle: :face_with_monocle: 

To participate in the event, you must align yourself with :one:  of :three:  Factions. And don't worry, you won't be rushed into making this decision! :fingers_crossed: 

Starting on **5/9/2024 3:00 PM**, we'll unveil details of :one:  of the :three:  Factions each day at the same time, providing you with plenty of time to explore, consider, and make your decision wisely :eyes: :eyes::eyes:

:raised_hands:**You will not be locked into your decision right away**  :raised_hands: 

Feel free to explore the characteristics and ideals of each Faction as they're revealed, and if something resonates with you more strongly,** you can always change your decision before the event begins, which will be on **5/12/2024 3:00 PM:fire: !

:star2: Make your decision here: https://discord.com/channels/1114018692431351879/1202184025230561321 :star2: 

Once you've made your choice, you'll gain access to a dedicated Discord channel for your Faction :sparkles: !This will be your hub for socializing and connecting with fellow members of your chosen Faction :handshake: !

So stay tuned for the Faction reveals :sparkles:, and get ready to embark on an epic journey with your chosen allies :boom: !

Yes, there will be 🎁 prizes involved, of course!

title: Seekers Alliance - 📜│bounty-board
Seekers Alliance - 📜│bounty-board
html:
**You must be in a Faction to participate.** If you do not have a Faction, you must complete a line in the tic-tac-toe by yourself before you can apply to join a Faction. 

1.	Each day, 1️⃣ new quest awaits, revealed at  5/12/2024 3:00 PM. ⭐️A new Discord channel will open for each quest⭐️. Respond in the channel to complete the quest. 

2.	Quests remain open for 4️⃣8️⃣ hours, giving you a chance to catch up if you missed yesterday's quest🔥.

3.	The Faction with the **highest percentage** of members completing each mission will claim the grid corresponding to that mission 👑. Think of it as putting down a X or O in the tic-tac-toe. (Note: instead of # of participants, we are using % to be fair to the Factions with fewer numbers, based on previous feedback.)

4.	Your objective🎯? Secure three in a row as a Faction, whether horizontally, vertically, or diagonally.

5.	When the event ends, the Faction with the most lines will emerge victorious 🏆!


So, Seekers, it's time to gear up for the event kick-off later at 5/12/2024 3:00 PM:fire: !! Don't forget to https://discord.com/channels/1114018692431351879/1202184025230561321

title: Seekers Alliance - 📜│bounty-board
html:
# 9️⃣ Days Tic-Tac-Toe Adventure - The Grand Finale 


Wow @Seekers 💫!! Our event has come to an end… It's a bit sad, isn't it 😭? Everyone did an amazing job🔥! We had such a great time together ⭐️, and I hope you enjoyed the event and the NFT reveals as much as I did ✨!

Now, it's time to announce the winner of the event! 

 🏆 The winner is... **House Galahad** !!! 🏆  Congrats on forming an incredible 3️⃣ lines 🔥!

To the Van-Der-Leck Family and Mahdia Alliance, don't be discouraged 💪. You all did great 🔥, and there's always next time to claim victory ✌️!

 🎉 The prize for this event is **1️⃣0️⃣ card packs**!! 

- Members of ** @Galahad  ** are eligible to join the raffle!  

 🎉 Special Champion Prize:  **1️⃣card packs**!! 
- **@Champion (Lvl1) **  are eligible to join the special raffle! There will be 3 winners that can get this Special Champion Prize!

We've set up https://discord.com/channels/1114018692431351879/1114063896110706748  for the raffle, and it will be open for the next 7️⃣2️⃣ hours. 

Don't miss your chance to win this fantastic prize—make sure you get your entry in ✨!

Additionally, we've got a ** 🎊 special prize 🎊** for the top players from each faction who completed the most daily quests: 1️⃣ card pack each! 

The top players are: 

Mahdia: @Monaludao @Irving @ymxc.@Heyyo 
Galahad: @221B@Howay⭐  @.Louis  @dengdendeng @montytran | Rho Markets  
Van-Der-Leck: @Silverc 

Congratulations 🎉🔥

Thank you all for participating and making this event so much fun 🤩 See you at the next event ✨!!!


# 🌟 Exciting News! 🌟

We've just launched https://discord.com/channels/1114018692431351879/1240389801660776489  dedicated to our amazing artworks! 🎨✨ Let's dive into a world of creativity and inspiration ✨. Check it out now!!

See ya, seekers!

title: Seekers Alliance - 📜│bounty-board
html:
# :bangbang::art: Sticker Battle :art::bangbang:

Hi @Seekers!! Are you ready for our exciting brand-new event? 

Do you love to draw or create :art:? Do you have unique and exciting ideas buzzing in your head :sparkles:? Are you interested in making something that can be cherished forever :crown: ?

If so, come and join our **Sticker Battle**!:fire:

Before getting started, let’s go over the rules:scroll::

1.    This event is all about creating stickers for our Discord channel, giving everyone a chance to have their work featured :sparkles:. 
2.    The event will have  :three: rounds, each dedicated to one Faction. Seekers will create stickers for one Faction at a time.
3.    You, the Seekers, get to choose the **style of the stickers**! The voting channel is open: https://discord.com/channels/1114018692431351879/1250443638610329662 !!Cast your vote for your preferred style before **6/16/2024 5:00 PM**. Once the style is decided, you can start creating right away:fire:!
4.     You will only be eligible to join the event if you are part of a Faction. https://discord.com/channels/1114018692431351879/1202184025230561321  here. This channel will be open until 7/7/2024 5:00 PM. Share your work with your Faction, and vote on :three: artworks to represent your Faction in each round.
5.    At the end of each round, :three: stickers out of :nine: (3 entries from each Faction) will be chosen as final winners by popular vote. 
6.    You can only change your Faction once during this campaign, and only **on the first :two: days of each round**. ⛔️ Changing your Faction more than once may disqualify your from the event. :broken_heart:

title: Seekers Alliance - 📜│bounty-board
html:
I hope the rules are clear! Now, let's get to the exciting part – :fire: the prizes :fire:!

1.    All :nine: competitors of each round will earn the special role of **@Art Seeker **!
2.    The :three: winners of each round will each earn a Seekers Alliance card pack!
3.    The Faction with the most chosen artworks will also get a chance to join the final raffle of 10 card packs!

Our protagonists for the first round will be – **the Van der Leck Family**!

Before you dive into creating your amazing stickers, don’t forget to vote for the style! https://discord.com/channels/1114018692431351879/1250443638610329662 . The channel will be closed at **6/16/2024 5:00 PM**, so make your decision quickly!
You can change your Faction at https://discord.com/channels/1114018692431351879/1202184025230561321  until **6/16/2024 5:00 PM**! Make up your mind before then and join the Faction to achieve victory!

Let's get creative and have some fun:star_struck:!

title: Seekers Alliance - 📜│bounty-board
html:
Hey @Seekers 💫! Have you started working on your Van der Leck family sticker  🔥? Here's some info ℹ️ about them and a guide 🗒️ to get you going! Check it out 💪!

#  🔥 A Glimpse into the Van der Leck Family 🔥
Members of the Van der Leck family hail from all corners of the world, encompassing **furry and humans**, but they share one common trait: **ambition**  👑. They are united in their quest for a new world order, where power is earned by the capable and patience is key to success 👑. 

Their eyes reveal their relentless **ambition and desire for a new order**, while their **meticulous attire** reflects their dedication to these values 🔍.

How are you going to depict the Van der Leck family in your stickers 😍? I can't wait to see what you come up with!

**Key words: ambitious, patient, powerful, gun, order, alcoholic drinks, fortune, youthful, strategic, passionate, cunning, glory**

#  🗒️ What to do next? 🗒️

Now that you've got a better grasp of the Van der Leck Family ✨, you might be wondering what to do next❓ Here's your guide 🗒️:

1. Visualize how a Van der Leck Family member should look like 👀.
2. Brainstorm sticker ideas 💡.
3. Start creating your Van der Leck Family member sticker (use any method you prefer) 🔥.
4. Complete your sticker by 6/24/2024 1:00 PM and share it with your Faction.
5. Discuss with your Faction to choose the 3️⃣ stickers that will represent your Faction.
6. Vote for your favorite sticker on 6/25/2024 1:00 PM 🗳️!

Time to start your creation!! Let's make this fun!! 🤩

#  🔥 A Glimpse into Mahdia Alliance 🔥
Being the guardian of the **ancient virtues**, members of the Mahdia Alliance are wise philosophers and free-spirited artists, exploring the mysteries of reality and existence. 

Instead of chasing after new and trendy ideas, Mahdia Alliance believe in the value of ancient virtues and traditions.

With a lineage tied to **dragons**, they have a deep spiritual connection to these majestic creatures, guiding their actions with determination and discretion.

You can see their connection to **dragons** in their appearance, and their belief in **ancient traditions** in the way they dress.

How are you going to depict Mahdia Alliance in your stickers 😍? I can't wait to see what you come up with!

Members of House Galahad are **skilled hackers, relentless dreamers, and fearless pioneers** who were among the first to venture into the new world 🗺️.


House Galahad embodies the longing for **freedom, crowd governance, and a fresh start in the new world** 🔥. They believe that the old world was built on mistakes and are determined to lay the foundation for a better future by harnessing the powerful forces hidden within this new realm.

They possess a deep passion for **technology** and an extensive knowledge of the latest trends, relishing the opportunity to explore and apply new advancements :desktop:. Their expertise lies in using **intelligence and strategy** to achieve their goals, employing creativity, tactics, and ingenuity :brain:.

title: Seekers Alliance - 📜│bounty-board
html:
# **Creators Guild**

# **1.     Meme**

**To complete this quest, you'll need to create a meme that mentions both Seekers Alliance and Movement.**

**Requirements: **
1.    Must be related to both Seekers Alliance and Movement

Follow these steps to finish the quest:
1. **Create a meme** that relates to both **Seekers Alliance and Movement**.
2. **Submit your meme** to https://discord.com/channels/1114018692431351879/1267567220909670430 .
3. **An admin will verify your work** and give you a @Meme Seeker role.
4. **Return to Galxe** to verify your completion and claim your reward.

# **2.     Stickers**

**To complete this quest, you'll need to create a sticker that is about Seekers Alliance.**

**Requirements: **
2.    Dimension: 320px x 320px
3.    File type: PNG
4.    About Seekers Alliance 

Follow these steps to finish the quest:
1. **Create a Sticker** that meets the requirements. 
2. **Submit your Sticker** to :yellow_circle:│movement-galxe-submissions https://discord.com/channels/1114018692431351879/1267567220909670430 .
3. **An admin will verify your work** and give you a @Sticker Seeker role.
4. **Return to Galxe** to verify your completion and claim your reward.


# **3.    Emojis**

**To complete this quest, you'll need to create at least 3 emojis in the same collection with a similar look-and-feel that are about Seekers Alliance.**

**Requirements: **
1.    Dimensions: 128x128 pixels
2.    File type: PNG
3.    About Seekers Alliance 
4.    A collection of at least 3 similar emojis 

Follow these steps to finish the quest:
1. **Create at least 3 Emojis** that meet the requirements. 
2. **Submit your Emojis** to https://discord.com/channels/1114018692431351879/1267567220909670430 .
3. **An admin will verify your work** and give you a @Emoji Seeker role.
4. **Return to Galxe** to verify your completion and claim your reward.

# **:bangbang: Announcement :bangbang:**

@Seeker

Based on community feedback, Movement decided to remove the Chatty/Chattier/Chattiest quests from the Explorers Guild for ALL projects.

We stand behind this decision because it's been a grind and not very beneficial to our community.

title: Seekers Alliance - 📜│bounty-board
html:
# **‼️💪 SEEKERS ALLIANCE OLYMPICS 💪‼️**
Hey @Seekers !!!!
Enjoyed the Olympics? Ever dreamed of being part of the action 😎 ? 
Now’s your chance! Seekers Alliance is hosting an exclusive Olympics for our incredible Seekers✨ . 
Get ready to join a Faction, give it your all, and compete for amazing prizes 🎁 . Let the games begin🔥 !

**Overview 👀**:
•    Duration: 2️⃣ 0️⃣  Days (August 17 - September 6)
•    Structure: A new competitive mission will be released every 5️⃣  days.
•    Winner: The Faction with the highest final score at the end of the event.

 
# ✉️ Mission 1️⃣ : Faction Pet Parade ✉️
•    **🎯 Objective**: Share pictures of your real-life pets, dolls, or plushies, dressed in your Faction's colors or featuring faction characteristics.

•    **👤 Faction Representatives**: Each Faction will select 3️⃣  representatives to participate based on voting results.

•    **📥 Submission Channel**: Post your pictures and use the 👍 emoji to vote. The top 3️⃣  entries with the most reactions will be your representatives.

 o    House Galahad: ⁠https://discord.com/channels/1114018692431351879/1273361550648016936  
 o    Mahdia Alliance: https://discord.com/channels/1114018692431351879/1273361665186070560  
 o    Van-der-Leck Family: https://discord.com/channels/1114018692431351879/1273361755363479635  

•    **🏅 Winner**: All Seekers will cast their votes. The top 3 entries (out of 9 total) with the highest votes among the representatives will be the winners for this round.

•    **⚔️ Scoring**:
 o    1st Place: 400 points
 o    2nd Place: 200 points
 o    3rd Place: 100 points

•    **🗓️ Key Dates**:
 o   You can change your Faction until 8/23/2024 4:00 PM.
 o   The submission period for Faction representatives ends on 8/24/2024 4:00 PM.
 o   Final voting 🗳️ begins at 8/25/2024 4:00 PM.
 o   A new mission will be released on 8/26/2024 4:00 PM.

title: Seekers Alliance - 📜│bounty-board
html:
# **‼️💪 SEEKERS ALLIANCE OLYMPICS - Mission 1️⃣ Result 💪‼️**

Hey @Seekers!

Great job on Mission 1️⃣ 🔥! It was fantastic to see all your pets and toys embodying the spirit of your Faction ✨. The creativity and effort you put in were truly impressive!

Now, I know you're all eager to hear the results, get ready...🥁🥁🥁

🎉 Congratulations to **House Galahad**! 🎉 You've claimed victory in Mission One and earned a well-deserved 400 points!

🎉 Coming in second is **the Mahdia Alliance**🎉 with 200 points—excellent work!

🎉 And a big shoutout to **the Van-der-Leck Family**🎉 for securing third place with 100 points—well done!


Amazing effort Seekers!!!

Mission 2️⃣ will be announced on **8/29/2024 4:00 PM**, so stay tuned 🔥. 


Don’t miss out on your chance to win more prizes 🔥!

title: Seekers Alliance - 📜│bounty-board
html:
# ✉️ Mission 2️⃣: Question Mastery Challenge✉️


Hey @Seekers 🔥!

Are you ready to conquer and claim first place in Mission 2️⃣?
Here are the details 📝—read carefully 👀!


• **🎯 Objective**: Test which Faction knows the Seekers Alliance world best! A quiz will be launched simultaneously for all Factions on **8/31/2024 7:00 AM**. Seekers can join the quiz through their Faction’s channel ✨.

•    **🏅 Winner**: The Faction with the highest combined score from the top 1️⃣0️⃣ Seekers will be the winner.

•    **⚔️ Scoring**:
 o    1st Place: 400 points
 o    2nd Place: 200 points
 o    3rd Place: 100 points

•    **🗓️ Key Dates**:
 o   The quiz will be launched on **8/31/2024 7:00 AM**.

•    **:gift: Prizes**:
 o    Top :one: :zero:  seeker: Earn the role of ** @Truth Seeker **
 o    Seeker with the highest score of each Faction: **@Champion (Lvl1) **

title: Seekers Alliance - 📜│bounty-board
html:
# ✉️ Mission 3️⃣?: Battle of the Bummers✉️



• **🎯 Objective**: Share your worst moment from last week 🔥! Even the most outstanding Seekers face tough times🥹 . Let it out, and let's bear the burden together!


• **👤 Faction Representatives**: Each Faction will select 3️⃣ representatives to participate based on voting results.


• **📥 Submission Channel**: Post your story and use the 👍 emoji to vote. The top 3️⃣ entries with the most reactions will be your representatives.
 o House Galahad: ⁠https://discord.com/channels/1114018692431351879/1273361550648016936 
 o Mahdia Alliance: https://discord.com/channels/1114018692431351879/1273361665186070560 
 o Van-der-Leck Family: https://discord.com/channels/1114018692431351879/1273361755363479635 


• **🏅 Winner**: All Seekers will cast their votes. The top 3️⃣  entries (out of 9 total) with the highest votes among the representatives will be the winners for this round.


• **⚔️ Scoring**:
 o 1st Place: 400 points
 o 2nd Place: 200 points
 o 3rd Place: 100 points


• **🗓️ Key Dates**:
 o The submission period for Faction representatives starts on 9/2/2024 4:00 PM.
 o The submission period for Faction representatives ends on 9/11/2024 4:00 PM.
 o Final voting 🗳️ begins at 9/12/2024 4:00 PM.
 o A new mission will be released on 9/13/2024 4:00 PM.

title: Seekers Alliance - 📜│bounty-board
html:
# ✉️ Mission 4️⃣: The Ultimate Game Showdown✉️
Hey @Seekers 🔥!

Welcome back! Are you ready for the final mission? Don't miss your chance to secure victory for your Faction! Don’t lose the prize and the @Olympian role!!

•  **🎯 Objective**: Find out which faction will dominate in our Seekers Olympics Game Night! Join the fun, participate in at least one game during the game night to earn the @Mission 4 while contributing to your faction's success 🔥!

•    **🏅 Winner**: The faction with the most Seekers joining the Seekers Olympics Game Night.

•    **⚔️ Scoring**:
  o    1st Place: 400 points
  o    2nd Place: 200 points
  o    3rd Place: 100 points

•    **🗓️ Key Dates**:
  o   You can check **Events** for the full schedule of game night.
  o   The ultimate winning Faction will be announced at 9/21/2024 4:30 PM
